ComicInfo.Title: 1993 Update
ComicInfo.Series: The Tick's Giant Circus of the Mighty
ComicInfo.Summary: This the third in the three-comic 'mini-series' of the official 'Encyclopedia' to the Tick Universe. Each issue features 1 to 3-page long write-ups about various important characters who have appeared in Tick and Tick-related comics. Issue 3 covers events that happened after the 1&2 were published.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 08:33:31. [CVDB304378] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 16:04:23. [Issue ID 265684]
ComicInfo.Characters: Man-Eating Cow,Sagin,The Tick,Lord Byron,Captain Academia,Multiple Santa,Paul the Samurai,Tuun-La,Chainsaw Vigilante,Barry Hubris,Crime Cannibal,Thrakkorzog,Mr. Tragedy,The Fuzzy Person,Mr. Krinkles
